newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-NAB cuts fixed home loan rates.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-NAB cuts fixed home loan rates.

text.p: National Australia Bank Ltd (NAB) said on Thursday it had cut its entire range of fixed rate home loans effective from Monday.
The new rates include a one-year fixed rate of 6.99 percent per annum and a two-year fixed rate of 7.99 per annum as part of a home loan package, NAB said.
Interest rates on all stand alone fixed rate home loans have also been reduced. The one-year fixed interest rate has been cut by more than one percent to 7.90 percent, it said.
